channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Locked and chained gate obstructing the byway, 15th November
item.description:
I was trapped on this byway and was only able to escape as a gentleman helped lift my wheelchair late at night. As a vulnerable woman I am concerned as to why this gate is able to lock on a byway forcing those in wheelchairs to be trapped. Direct Gov are very clear that byways must be accessible to all forms of transport.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Station Road, Crayford, Bexleyheath, London Borough of Bexley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A car parked more than 2 hours with headlights on., 15th November
item.description:
I believe that it is illegal parking with headlights on. Registration number starts with LG99 or LO99 black colour low body sports car kind of car.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Waldenshaw Road, Forest Hill, Sydenham, London Borough of Lewisham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Forest bike left in middle of pedestrian only space. Datchelor Place, 15th November
item.description:
This damaged bike has been left in a street that is pedestrian only. It has now been moved to the end of the street. All Forest & Lime bikes will be removed from this pedestrian only area.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Datchelor Place, Camberwell, London Borough of Southwark
Report on FixMyStreet
